title: Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood 01-52 [English Dubbed]
description:
Two brothers lose their mother to an incurable disease. With the power
of "alchemy", they use taboo knowledge to resurrect her. The process fails,
and as a toll for using this type of alchemy, the older brother, Edward Elric
loses his left leg while the younger brother, Alphonse Elric loses his entire
body. To save his brother, Edward sacrifices his right arm and is able to
affix his brother's soul to a suit of armor. With the help of a family friend,
Edward receives metal limbs - "automail" - to replace his lost ones.
With that, Edward vows to search for the Philosopher's Stone to
return the brothers to their original bodies, even if it means
becoming a "State Alchemist", one who uses his/her
alchemy for the military.
